commissionLevels.title: Commission Levels
commissionLevels.forexMetalsOnly: Commissions ONLY on Forex and Metals

messages.dataLoadError: Error loading data. Please try again later.

onboarding.title: Introducing Broker Program
onboarding.subtitle: Become a partner with AGM Broker and earn recurring commissions from your referred clients' trades

competitiveCommissions.title: Competitive Commissions
competitiveCommissions.description: Earn up to $4 USD per lot traded. Tier system that increases your commissions based on the number of active referrals.

unlimitedGrowth.title: Unlimited Growth
unlimitedGrowth.description: No referral limits. The more active clients you have, the higher your tier and commissions per lot.

dedicatedSupport.title: Dedicated Support
dedicatedSupport.description: Access to marketing materials, real-time dashboard, and priority support for IBs.

features.title: What do you get as an IB?

requirements.title: Regulatory Requirements
requirements.description: To comply with financial regulations, all Introducing Brokers must review and accept our IB Agreement before activating this functionality.
requirements.agreementInfo: The agreement establishes your rights, obligations, and commission structure. Your electronic acceptance will have legal validity.

cta.disclaimer: By continuing, you will review the complete Introducing Broker Agreement

footer.questions: Have questions? Contact our support team or check the

agreement.title: Introducing Broker (IB) Agreement
agreement.subtitle: Please read carefully before accepting
agreement.scrollIndicator: Scroll to the bottom to continue
agreement.checkbox: I have read, understood, and fully accept the terms and conditions of the Introducing Broker Agreement. I confirm that I have the legal capacity to enter into this agreement and that my electronic acceptance has the same validity as a handwritten signature.
agreement.mustRead: You must read the entire document before accepting
agreement.legal: By accepting this agreement, you acknowledge that you have been informed of your rights and obligations as an Introducing Broker. Your IP and acceptance data will be recorded for regulatory compliance.
agreement.successMessage: Congratulations! You are now an active Introducing Broker
